original_title: Ricky Martin - Black and White Tour
overview: Ricky Martin Live Black & White Tour is the second live album by Ricky Martin, released by Sony BMG Norte. It was recorded during his performances at the "José Miguel Agrelot Coliseum" in Puerto Rico on August 10 and August 11, 2007 as a part of his worldwide tour "Black & White".
tagline: Ricky Martin: Live - Black and White Tour
title: Ricky Martin: Live - Black and White Tour
